attributes.action: Change the Law to stop the use of the Employers "dismissal and re-engagement" mechanism to implement unilateral changes (Breach of Contract) in terms and conditions of Employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many employees have been bullied and threatened with the use of the "dismissal and re-engagement" mechanism to implement unilateral changes in terms and conditions by the hard-nosed employer.
It is time that this government changed the law so employers can't pressurise employees into submission. Especially as employers go into negotiations about unilaterally changing employee working terms & conditions, only to pressurise and scare employees with this tactic when they don't get their employees agreement.
